          <title>
            <string language="en">Substances formed in reaction with acids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Substanzen bildeten sich in der Reaktion mit 
Säuren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les substances ont formé dans la réaction à 
des acides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As substâncias deram forma na reação com 
ácidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le sostanze hanno formato nella reazione con gli 
acidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουσίες που διαμορφώνονται στην αντίδραση με τα οξέα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las sustancias formaron en la reacción con los 
ácidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the new substances that are formed when zinc reacts with hydrochloric acid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reactivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zinc</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zinc chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die neuen Substanzen, die 
gebildet werden, wenn Zink mit Salzsäure reagiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les nouvelles 
substances qui sont formées quand le zinc réagit avec de l'acide 
chlorhydrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as substâncias novas 
que são dadas forma quando o zinco reage com o ácido hydrochloric.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le nuove sostanze che
sono formate quando lo zinco reagisce con acido cloridrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει νέες ουσίες που 
διαμορφώνονται όταν αντιδρά ο ψευδάργυρος με το υδροχλωρικό οξύ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las sustancias nuevas 
se forman que cuando el cinc reacciona con el ácido hidroclórico.</string>
          </description>
